title: Bug 33316FontDialog needs FontData[] API
description: Bug 33316FontDialog needs FontData[] API FontDialog's open() and setFontData() methods are the only way toreceive/provide FontData for specifying a font.But on motif, Fonts are oftenmade up of multiple FontDatas.Now that there's a Font constructor that takes FontData[], the dialog shouldreally be extended to also receive/provide FontData[] when needed.This isparticularly important in locales like chinese and japanese.
